docs.lead_paragraph: The grand and growing army of golfers will read with enthusiasm of the English physician who exalts the physical benefits of their amusement. He declares that there is no disease for which golf is not good. This does not quite justify the headline, "Golf Viewed as Cure-All." Dr. FOWLER did not say that he would send to the links patients suffering from double pneumonia or arthritis.
docs.abstract: Ed on reported invention of crumbless cracker
